name: io.github.sakce/mcp-server-monday
description: MCP Server to interact with Monday.com boards and items

tools.name: monday-create-item
tools.description: Creates a new item or sub-item in a Monday.com board

tools.name: monday-get-board-groups
tools.description: Retrieves all groups from a specified Monday.com board

tools.name: monday-create-update
tools.description: Creates a comment/update on a Monday.com item

tools.name: monday-list-items-in-groups
tools.description: Lists all items in specified groups of a Monday.com board

tools.name: monday-list-subitems-in-items
tools.description: Lists all sub-items for given Monday.com items

tools.name: monday-create-board-group
tools.description: Creates a new group in a Monday.com board

tools.name: monday-move-item-to-group
tools.description: Moves a Monday.com item to a different group

tools.name: monday-get-item-updates
tools.description: Retrieves updates/comments for a specific item

tools.name: monday-get-docs
tools.description: Lists documents in Monday.com, optionally filtered by folder

tools.name: monday-get-doc-content
tools.description: Retrieves the content of a specific document

tools.name: monday-create-doc
tools.description: Creates a new document in Monday.com

tools.name: monday-add-doc-block
tools.description: Adds a block to an existing document
